casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Jeffrey Leonard SHUFORD. No. 64P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. Charlesena Walker, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Jeffrey Leonard Shuford. Jeffrey Leonard Shuford, Pro Se. David L. Elliott, Assistant Attorney General, William C. Young, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th day of February 2004 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th day of August 2004."
